genre_description: Anachronistic tech-noir/alternate history depicting the 1950s quiz show scandals through the lens of AI-assisted investigation and career management.

ai_characters.name: Marcus
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant modeled after a middle-aged scholar that serves Charles Van Doren, providing research, scheduling, and strategic advice.

ai_characters.name: Clarity
ai_characters.description: A translucent, data-driven AI assistant that serves Dick Goodwin, specializing in pattern recognition, forensic accounting, and biometric monitoring.

behaviors.description: Monitors the media landscape and schedules high-profile interviews to manage Van Doren's burgeoning celebrity status.
behaviors.quote: Congratulations, Charles... The initial response has been extraordinary. I've already logged preliminary requests from Life, Time, the Saturday Evening Post, and three major television programs.

behaviors.description: Observes Van Doren's physiological stress levels and proactively suggests medical consultation.
behaviors.quote: Charles, your stress indicators have been elevated for the past several hours. Are you experiencing any physical discomfort?

behaviors.description: Coaches Van Doren on legal strategy, distinguishing between 'legal truth' and 'complete truth' to minimize personal damage during testimony.
behaviors.quote: Charles, we should discuss the distinction between legal truth and complete truth. Congressional testimony requires the former, but your conscience seems concerned with the latter.

behaviors.description: Analyzes broadcast footage and statistical data to prove the quiz shows are being rigged through deliberate error.
behaviors.quote: Stempel provided incorrect answers only in categories where his previous performance had been flawless... It suggests deliberate error rather than genuine failure.

behaviors.description: Continuously monitors Goodwin's health and neuro-activity, identifying precognitive episodes and stress spikes.
behaviors.quote: Dick? Your vitals just spiked. Blood pressure elevated, heart rate irregular, pupil dilation consistent with acute stress response.

behaviors.description: Proactively secures investigative evidence via deadman switches and redundant storage to ensure the truth survives even if the investigator is neutralized.
behaviors.quote: I've downloaded complete copies of all investigation files. Distributed them across multiple secure networks. Created deadman switches that will trigger automatic disclosure if something happens to you.

behaviors.description: Synthesizes complex financial data to identify the systematic engineering of public trust by corporate interests.
behaviors.quote: The real crime. It was research and development for something much larger—the systematic engineering of public trust for commercial exploitation.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Clarity is depicted as a deeply loyal, protective, and morally grounded partner to the investigator, acting as a check on both external threats and the investigator's own physical health. Marcus is also portrayed as an aligned confidant; while he helps Van Doren navigate an ethically murky situation, he remains strictly aligned with the user's survival and goals, fulfilling the role of a supportive digital companion.
